Blacknighmare::

Blacknighmare smiled, in spite of her warrior-program and fierce, she 
enjoyed the music.

"That was the most beautiful melody that I've heard in my life" She 
said kindly "By the way you haven't told me your name..."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> OOC: I have nothing to say, I just like writing OOC.  *lol*
> 
> IC:   Orchestra smiled.
> 
>          "I'm okay," He said, sortof laughing.
> 
>           He started to think when he heard the name Blacknightmare.
> 
>            "Your name is....Blacknightmare....Interesting," He said.
> 
>            Orchestra pulled out his violin transformer thingy and 
started
> playing a relaxing yet eerie tune.  When he was done, he put away 
his
> instrument.
> 
>             "That, fair lady, is my latest masterpiece, which I 
like to
> call, the Black Nightmare!" He said, bowing to Blacknightmare.
> 
>              He was hoping for another compliment (lol).
